thread.title: Kathy Barnard
thread.title_full: Microfiber Wholesale reviewed by Kathy Barnard

author: Kathy Barnard
title: Kathy Barnard
text:
After having trouble getting the handle to telescope, my initial experience with the online chat on their website led me to believe my mop did NOT have a telescoping handle. Thinking I would have to purchase a telescoping handle, I wrote a less than stellar review.
After my review, someone immediately called me and said my handle DID telescope and helped me get the handle to telescope. She was very pleasant and helpful.
The mop works great so far. It would be helpful if the website listed exactly what comes with the product (e.g. Telescoping mop handle). Sometimes the words mop handle and mop tool in the descriptions can be confusing. Also, the online chat people could benefit from learning more about the products being sold on the system.
